name: Lives Lost
description:
Navigate around the spaceship, find the required items and bring them to the escape pod. 
When the suit energy runs out, you'll die. (Don't worry, there's always another body...)

[The spaceship layout and required tasks are both randomly generated, so each playthrough will be different]

CONTROLS

  • 'E' Collect and drop items
  • 'A' and 'D' to rotate
  • 'Space' to move around using boosters
  • 'P' to pause

KNOWN BUGS  (Build to be updated)

  • 'Tutorial' UI will not scale correctly unless game is fullscreen
  • Ability to pick up multiple items at once
    • Workaround: Press 'E' to drop item(s), then pick up the required item
  • Picking up an item may be unresponsive
    • Workaround: Press 'E' until the item is picked up
  • Ending cutscene text is incorrect: Should list the number of bodies "wasted"
  • If the player restarts the game in-game (as opposed to refreshing the page), completing any task will complete the game
    • Workaround: Refresh the page to restart the game
  • Please let us know if you find any more!

SETTINGS  (refresh the page to reset)

  • Music Slider
  • Sound Effects Slider
  • Adjustable number of tasks
  • Adjustable boost power
  • Adjustable air resistance

TEAM

  • Jess Molloy: Art, Design
  • Levi Delaney: Programming

MUSIC

  • Ascending by Eric Skiff

Special Thanks to Thomas P.Holt for forming the team
